manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For Anywehere, Anytime! For Those Diaper Moments Pick up a pack of Eco Wave Baby Water Wipes and start your journey to a brighter, better way of living. Our wipes are made with natural bamboo material – the most sustainable material there is - and infused with 99% purified water, perfect for super sensitive newborn skin. 99% Pure Water Wipes With a no-nasty promise, Eco Wave baby wipes are trusted by moms and dads all over the world. Our bamboo wipes use pure water and natural ingredients to clean skin and clear mess without a fuss. You’ll find no chemicals, parabens, sulphates, alcohol or fragrances in our sensitive baby wipes. Our packs of unscented, wipes are hypo-allergenic and a fantastic option for families with sensitive skin. Baby Wipes that Break Down In Nature We all know how many wipes parents go through when caring for a newborn baby. It sometimes feels like a never-ending pile of dirty diapers and messy wipes. By simply switching to a Eco Wave's cleaning wipe suitable for children and babies, you drastically reduce the amount of waste produced every single day.

Our Certificates Our wipes are certified EN13432 EN13432 CERTIFIED: Eco Wave baby wipes are EN13432 certified, meaning they meet strict European composting guidelines. (Certificate by TÜV AUSTRIA issued on January, 2016) One Tree Planted We plant trees! We've partnered with One Tree Planted and donate a portion of our profits to them every year to help them on their mission of planting more trees around the world.
Thank You For Choosing Eco Wave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Compostable Wipes All Around
reviews.reviewText: I've tried so many 'natural' and 'water' wipes, but these are hands down the best. They are the only wipes that are truly effective at cleaning up messes off the wood floor and are gentle enough to use as makeup wipes and daily hand wipes. These actually check off every box for what I needed: not sticky at all, minimal ingredients, no harsh chemicals, no greasy oils, no strong fragrance, they are compostable, and interestingly they clean up stains and spills instantly with no extra scrubbing. I have cockatiels and often have to clean up their "poop" on the floor on their perches, sometimes dried poop. These wipes clean it up instantly with no extra effort. It makes sense that they would be great baby wipes being the perfect combo of being super effective yet ultra gentle. They are not big in size, but not too small either. For my needs they are a perfect size. I hope they never stop making these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option for safer ingredients
reviews.reviewText: Durable, safer ingredients than big store brands, gentle on skin, great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Earth friendly baby product.
reviews.reviewText: My LO has sensitive skin and he does not have any breakouts with this. The wipes itself are soft, moist and appears durable. Overall, for the price and it’s functionality, I do recommend this product.Although, the only thing I probably am not happy with is that it did come wrapped in plastic. Was hoping for it to come in a recyclable box as advertised. Nothing to do with the product’s functionality, just the principle it goes by.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than most wipes I’ve tried
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are eco friendly and don’t get all stuck together when you pull one out, unlike other wipes. Other wipes I’ve tried always come out in bundles that I don’t need. You’d want wipes that pull out like Kleenex like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing wipes!
reviews.reviewText: These are by far the most amazing environmental friendly wipes and the best I have ever used! They even come out one at a time which makes cleaning bottoms easier and they don’t dry out like the other product wipes I used called the baby cozy wipes. I love love love these wipes and have a full box of 12 but please Amazon I’m begging for this product to come back in stock!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft but don’t work as well as others
reviews.reviewText: Have to use more than other brands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Product, Terrible Execution
reviews.reviewText: Loved these wipes for our 2 kiddos and decided to order again. The first time our 12 pack (768 wipes) arrived with just 1 pack (64 wipes). Probably a mistake, so no issues. Returned the product siting an error and asked for a reship… the 2nd package came in today with the SAME error. Come on now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love these! Biodegradable, small packaging, unscented
reviews.reviewText: we love these wipes - they aren't super fluffy, the are on the thinner side. but I don't have any issues getting my baby's booty clean. We love that they are unscented and biodegradable. they are good sized. I scanned these with the Yuka app and they rate them 100/100.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Just water & bamboo, so easy for baby skin
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as advertised, only woven bamboo (compostable) and clear water and very strong - never had a mishap when cleaning our youngest even in those moments I wished I did not have to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for wiping my children’s faces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bamboo has been embraced by manufacturers and consumers eager for eco-friendly products. This plant is perfectly sustainable as it regenerates after being cut back. It's amazing what a wide range of products bamboo can be made into - tableware, packaging, kitchen utensils and wipes like these.In the relatively quick move towards plastc-free wipes, fibrous bamboo is naturally playing a big part. But there's money to be made from sustainable eco products which means that the quality can vary as companies attempt to fuel our appetite.One thing you may have noticed is that bamboo baby wipes are generally much more expensive than regular baby wipes - and £3 a pack is not unusual. This box of 12 packs of vegan Eco Wave each containing 64 wipes presently work out to just £2.08 each.So are they any good? I'm pleased to say they're great. They're far and away the best bamboo baby wipes I've had and no real compromise to be made when compared to plastic based wipes - but so much better for the planet.Add to this the fact that Eco Wave Baby Wipes are unscented - hurrah! - biodegradable and compostable. They're also alcohol, sulfate and paraben-free, cruelty free and hypoallergenic.But the single thing you'll really notice when you take delivery of these? - The weight of this box of 12 packs. That's because these wipes are very, very moist as well as a good size at 15x20cm/6x8". They contain 99% purified water too. Nothing to irritate or harm baby here - whether now or in the future given their lack of plastic.I'm overall enthusiastic. Just one thing - I'd like to know the wipe's country of origin. I couldn't find this on the pack or anywhere in the listing and I'd like to know, hence my 4 star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will buy those again and again. They are well made and very absorbent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is many wipes on the market but not all are suitable for sensitive skin like this water Eco wave wipes.-This baby wipes are 100% biodegradable and compostable-Eco-friendly-Unscented-Hypoallergenic-Vegan-Alcohol-FreeThe box contains 12 pack of water bamboo Eco wipes perfect to use at home or very handy in changing bag while traveling. Safe to use even for sensitive skin. Great quality and value for money. Highly recommended
